name: bfastjs
description: javascript client sdk for bfast::cloud project

scripts.build: npm run build:web && npm run build:node
scripts.build:web: npx gulp updateNode && npx webpack --config webpack.config.js
scripts.publish:web: npx gulp updateNode && npm run build:web && npm publish
scripts.build:node: npx gulp updateNode && cd node && webpack --config webpack-node.config.js
scripts.publish:node: npx gulp updateNode && npm run build:node && cd node && npm publish
scripts.publish:all: npm run publish:web && npm run publish:node

author: Fahamu Tech
